content:
Haudi.

I've been using Rust off and on, looking to use it for some work stuff, but also help maintain the Vim and Neovim plugin ALE - Asynchronous Linting Engine. I'm looking forward to helping integrate further Rust support into ALE, and integrating Rust further into my company.
https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/commit/2b06041692dcdbc1c49292fd64fdc67da312c1ca - it seems someone beat me to fixing that documentation...
